 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new instance of a <code>.bigshot</code> archive filesystem adapter.
 19  * 
 20  * @class Bigshot archive filesystem.
 21  * @param {bigshot.ImageParameters|bigshot.VRPanoramaParameters} parameters the associated image parameters
 22  * @augments bigshot.FileSystem
 23  * @constructor
 24  */     
 25 bigshot.ArchiveFileSystem = function (parameters) {
 26     this.indexSize = 0;
 27     this.offset = 0;
 28     this.index = {};
 29     this.prefix = "";
 30     this.suffix = "";
 31     this.parameters = parameters;
 32     
 33     var browser = new bigshot.Browser ();
 34     var req = browser.createXMLHttpRequest ();
 35     req.open("GET", this.parameters.basePath + "&start=0&length=24&type=text/plain", false);   
 36     req.send(null);  
 37     if(req.status == 200) {
 38         if (req.responseText.substring (0, 7) != "BIGSHOT") {
 39             alert ("\"" + this.parameters.basePath + "\" is not a valid bigshot file");
 40             return;
 41         }
 42         this.indexSize = parseInt (req.responseText.substring (8), 16);
 43         this.offset = this.indexSize + 24;
 44         
 45         req.open("GET", this.parameters.basePath + "&type=text/plain&start=24&length=" + this.indexSize, false);   
 46         req.send(null);  
 47         if(req.status == 200) {
 48             var substrings = req.responseText.split (":");
 49             for (var i = 0; i < substrings.length; i += 3) {
 50                 this.index[substrings[i]] = {
 51                     start : parseInt (substrings[i + 1]) + this.offset,
 52                     length : parseInt (substrings[i + 2])
 53                 };
 54             }
 55         } else {
 56             alert ("The index of \"" + this.parameters.basePath + "\" could not be loaded: " + req.status);
 57         }
 58     } else {
 59         alert ("The header of \"" + this.parameters.basePath + "\" could not be loaded: " + req.status);
 60     }
 61 };
 62 
 63 
 64 bigshot.ArchiveFileSystem.prototype = { 
 65     getDescriptor : function () {
 66         this.browser = new bigshot.Browser ();
 67         var req = this.browser.createXMLHttpRequest ();
 68         
 69         req.open("GET", this.getFilename ("descriptor"), false);   
 70         req.send(null); 
 71         var descriptor = {};
 72         if(req.status == 200) {
 73             var substrings = req.responseText.split (":");
 74             for (var i = 0; i < substrings.length; i += 2) {
 75                 if (substrings[i] == "suffix") {
 76                     descriptor[substrings[i]] = substrings[i + 1];
 77                 } else {
 78                     descriptor[substrings[i]] = parseInt (substrings[i + 1]);
 79                 }
 80             }
 81             this.suffix = descriptor.suffix;
 82             return descriptor;
 83         } else {
 84             throw new Error ("Unable to find descriptor.");
 85         }
 86     },
 87     
 88     getPosterFilename : function () {
 89         return this.getFilename ("poster" + this.suffix);
 90     },
 91     
 92     getFilename : function (name) {
 93         name = this.getPrefix () + name;
 94         if (!this.index[name] && console) {
 95             console.log ("Can't find " + name);
 96         }
 97         var f = this.parameters.basePath + "&start=" + this.index[name].start + "&length=" + this.index[name].length;
 98         if (name.substring (name.length - 4) == ".jpg") {
 99             f = f + "&type=image/jpeg";
100         } else if (name.substring (name.length - 4) == ".png") {
101             f = f + "&type=image/png";
102         } else {
103             f = f + "&type=text/plain";
104         }
105         return f;
106     },
107     
108     getImageFilename : function (tileX, tileY, zoomLevel) {
109         var key = (-zoomLevel) + "/" + tileX + "_" + tileY + this.suffix;
110         return this.getFilename (key);
111     },
112     
113     getPrefix : function () {
114         if (this.prefix) {
115             return this.prefix + "/";
116         } else {
117             return "";
118         }
119     },
120     
121     setPrefix : function (prefix) {
122         this.prefix = prefix;
123     }
124 }
125 
126 bigshot.Object.validate ("bigshot.ArchiveFileSystem", bigshot.FileSystem);
127
